DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Expression: NOT(EXISTS(PredefinedType)) OR (PredefinedType <> IfcWasteTerminalTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) OR ((PredefinedType = IfcWasteTerminalTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) AND EXISTS (SELF\IfcObject.ObjectType))

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectTypeAssigned
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either there is no waste terminal type object associated, i.e. the _IsTypedBy_ inverse relationship is not provided, or the associated type object has to be of type _IfcWasteTerminalType_.
